name: Block Puzzle - Pop
description:
Block Puzzle Pop is a jewel style block game. Block puzzle Pop is very simple and addictive.

Crush more jewel blocks, Get more scores.

You will love this jewel style puzzle games when jewels particles splash on the screen.

BLOCK PUZZLE POP FEATURES
. Beautiful jewel blocks
. Four addictive game modes.
. Interesting sounds and music
. Easy to play, hard to master
. It is easy to learn
. It is offline game, so don not need wifi.

HOW TO PLAY BLOCK PUZZLE POP
. Drag the blocks to fill the grid with one column or one row
. When you create full line on the grid, you will get scores.
. The Blocks can not be rotated
. Game will be over if there are no space for any of the pending shapes.

Please Enjoy this Block Puzzle game and you will love this game!


https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.puzzlegamesclassic.blockpuzzle
